main.title: About the project
main.subtitle: Information about the project
main.first_paragraph: This project is a web application designed to provide an intuitive and practical interface, allowing users to generate QR Codes quickly and efficiently. The main goal is to enable anyone to enter text or a link and, with just one click, obtain a corresponding QR Code, ready to be downloaded and shared.
main.second_paragraph: The Web App was designed with a focus on simplicity and accessibility, ensuring that even users without technical knowledge can use it without difficulty.

subtopic.title: Curiosity
subtopic.description: A QR Code (Quick Response Code) is a two-dimensional code that stores data in a pattern of black and white modules arranged in a square matrix. It is based on Reed-Solomon coding for error correction, allowing it to be read even if it is partially damaged.
